title: Is We Dumb? | Coconut. Cereal. Prison. Fish Bomb.
description:
We all remember the time we taped fireworks to a fish and then accidentally blew a hole in our fishing boat, right? Oh, that's never happened to you? Fine. Let's talk about that, prolapsing your colon, getting extremely sad over toothpaste, a little tiny camera for your dong, and more on today's episode of Is We Dumb?!

New episodes every Wednesday at 12pm PST

Watch this episode on YouTube: https://youtu.be/SaoxxVyVDhw
